meanings.definition: The amount that a teaspoon can hold.
meanings.sent1: Mom added two teaspoonfuls of sugar to the tea.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for three teaspoonfuls of vanilla extract.
meanings.sent3: The tiny elf only needed a few teaspoonfuls of magic dust to fly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a teaspoonful of joy in a cup of sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with teaspoonfuls of colorful flowers.

meanings.sent1: Grandma always keeps a jar full of teaspoonfuls in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The children each took two teaspoonfuls of cough syrup.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten knocked over the jar of teaspoonfuls.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the sweet scent of teaspoonfuls of spices.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with shiny teaspoonfuls of gold coins.
